content: Revenue from the semiconductor market reached a record at $515 million, up 6% sequentially and up 19% year-over-year, reflecting broad-based demand for our Vacuum and Photonic Solutions. Power Solutions live another strong quarter in our plasma reactive gas, pressure, valves and illiquid control product groups, as well as our Photonic Solutions division each delivered record revenue in the semiconductor market. In the second quarter, I am pleased to say we also delivered record revenue in our services business, growing 8% sequentially and 9% over year to surpass a $100 million level for the first time.
